doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: circa 1800; alteration: 1842; alteration: 1897; alteration: 1921; alteration: 1930; alteration: 1976

El Mirador--Millburne site--Music Room by James Oldham from Soldiers Joy in Nelson County--Brick & Materials from 1816 Bernard Brown Jr House--Chiswell (Chillie) Dabney Langhorne & Nancy (Nanaire) Witcher Keene Home 1892--Ronald Tree Home--Lady Astor & Gibson Girl born here - from Langhornefamily

2 Story Brick, Paired Column Portico, Chinese Railing, Fanlight, 6/6, 9/9, Blinds, Broken Pediment Doorway, Stucco Wall Panels, Widows Walk, Hipped Roof, Figural Space, 5 Bay, 2 Pile, Flemish Bond, School, Barn, Serpentine Walls, Ghost, Stone Gateway Arch by Chiswell Dabney Langhorne, Spiral Stair & Stable by Delano
William Adams Delano, Architect 1921--Floyd Johnson, Architect 1976
survey data: National Register of Historic Places--Virginia Landmarks Register--Virginia Road Traces%Mutual Assurance Society Insurance Policy
